TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Build[COLOR_REVERT] Mammoth Herd; Elephant Myth; Mammoth Myth, Story, Story and Remains; Master Hunter, Carnival and Exotic Herbivore Cage
